title: Workout Kitchen
description: A website that allows the user to search for recipes and exercises. This was a group project that utilises API calls to Spoonacular and Exercises by API Ninjas.
features: Created with: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript, JQuery, JQuery UI, Ajax API

title: Code Quiz
description: A timed multiple-choice coding quiz that saves high scores to local storage.

title: README Generator
description: A command line application that creates a professional README markdown file based on the user's inputs.
features: Created with: Node.js and Inquirer npm

title: Weight Tracker
description: An application that helps you track your weight and shows your weight in a line graph
features: EmailJS, ChartJS, React-Icon, React Router, Material UI, EmotionsJS, Bootstrap

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A website that allows to search any location weather using OpenWeatherAPI!
features: OpenWeather API, Bootstrap, user local storage

title: Daily Planner
description: A helpful work day scheduler that allows the user to type and save events into each hour slot.
features: Created with: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript, JQuery, Moment.js
